description: The average SNR level for all the stations using
this VSC during the last three intervals is low.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11SNRLevelNotification IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-VIRTUAL-AP-MIB::coVirtualApSSID s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11CurrentSNRLevel i 0

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Service Set ID assigned to the VSC. This value must be
unique per radio interface.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-VIRTUAL-AP-MIB::coVirtualApSSID

description: Average SNR level for all the connected client stations.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11CurrentSNRLevel

description: Sent when a new association is made or sent periodically
using interval specified by
coDot11AssociationNotificationInterval object.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11AssociationNotification IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationName s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationSSID s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationIPAddress a 192.0.2.1 COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationMACAddress s EXAMPL COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11SignalLevel i 9999 COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11SNR i 9999 COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11TransmitRate u 9999 COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11NumberOfUsers u 9999

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Name of the associated station.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationName

description: SSID of the associated station.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationSSID

description: IP address of the associated station.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationIPAddress

description: Unique MAC Address assigned to the device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11StationMACAddress

description: Strength of the wireless signal.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11SignalLevel

description: Relative strength of the signal level compared to the noise
level.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11SNR

description: Current transmit rate of a station.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11TransmitRate

description: Indicates the number of users connected via this profile.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11NumberOfUsers

description: Sent when a new unauthorized AP is detected.

event.Summary: Unauthorized AP $v3 with MAC address $v4 detected on interface $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11UnauthorizedAPNotification IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanSSID s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanMacAddress s EXAMPL COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanChannel i 9999 COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanPHYType i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The Service Set ID broadcast by the remote device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanSSID

description: The wireless MAC address of the remote device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanMacAddress

description: The operating frequency channel of the remote device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanChannel

description: Radio type used by the device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-802DOT11-MIB::coDot11ScanPHYType
